messages.message:
Hey team, Eric was our CORS/CSRF/CSP guy, so I'm wondering if anyone has good answers for these tickets of the top of their head, i.e. how we handle these issues
CORS: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/FED-145
Cookies: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/FED-143
hey team, appreciate your answer on this; this is for our fedstart program.

For the Session Cookies,
We do set it to `HttpOnly` , `Secure` and `SameSite=Lax`. For CSRF, we have the challenge based token verification using the `X-Csrftoken` header.
Will need to check for the unique session identifier and strong session entropy part. Should be protected in transit with https.

For the CORS,
It looks like we are having the cors origins set to `*` (open to all origins).
`webserver/shared/src/py/instabase/utils/web/cors_util.py`
The `__stripe_mid` cookie is not set to HttpOnly - will need to confirm if that's intentional and is being accessed by JS
